Text:
This is a perfectly good edition, but the publisher's calling itself "Cambridge" is misleading. It has nothing to do with Cambridge Univ. Press. This is another one of those kindle instant publishers that takes a public domain text, adds some public domain introductory material, and tries to make a few bucks with it.

No complaints to the uploader! Just thought people should know what they're getting. I recommend the Pevear/Volokhonsky translation over this, however.
